Index » Finder

Class: Finder

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\Finder\Finder.coffee

Overview

Finder

Author:

  • Marvin Frachet marvin@konsserto.com

Instance Method Summary

  • # (Finder) files() Method allowing the file finder
  • # (Finder) recursive() Method allowing the recursive research in directories
  • # (Finder) notRecursive() Method disallowing the recursive research in directories
  • # (Finder) directories() Method allowing the directory finder
  • # (Finder) in(rootDir, recursive = @isRecursive) Method giving the list of the actual choice (directory or files) in the current folder
  • # (Object) display() Method giving the list of the actual choice (directory or files) in the current folder
  • # (Finder) name(name) Method filtering the files/directories by name
  • # (Finder) notName(name) Method filtering the files/directories by name (doesn't contain the name are kept)
  • # (Finder) size(size) Method filtering the files by size
  • # (Finder) sortBy(orderby, orderway) Method ordering the files/directories resultset
  • # (Finder) contains(content) Method filtering the files by content
  • # (Finder) ext(extension) Method filtering the files by extension

Constructor Details

# (Finder) constructor()

Class constructor

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

Instance Method Details

# (Finder) files()

Method allowing the file finder

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) recursive()

Method allowing the recursive research in directories

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) notRecursive()

Method disallowing the recursive research in directories

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) directories()

Method allowing the directory finder

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) in(rootDir, recursive = @isRecursive)

Method giving the list of the actual choice (directory or files) in the current folder

Parameters:

  • rootDir ( String ) — Root directory where the search starts
  • resursive ( Boolean ) — Default value set with the recursive/notRecursive method, but can be forced if needed

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Object) display()

Method giving the list of the actual choice (directory or files) in the current folder

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — The actual list of File or Directory wanted

# (Finder) name(name)

Method filtering the files/directories by name

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name that should filter

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) notName(name)

Method filtering the files/directories by name (doesn't contain the name are kept)

Parameters:

  • name ( String ) — Name that should filter

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) size(size)

Note: Only the files are concerned by this method files() should be called before

Method filtering the files by size

Examples:

How to call size 

size('< 500')
size('>= 253')

Parameters:

  • size ( Size ) — Size comparison that should filter the files variable

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) sortBy(orderby, orderway)

Method ordering the files/directories resultset

Parameters:

  • orderby ( String ) — Order by the attribute
  • orderway ( Boolean ) — Order by the orderway direction (DESC, ASC)

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) contains(content)

Note: This method should be long to execute if you have many folders and files
Note: Only the files are concerned by this method files() should be called before

Method filtering the files by content

Parameters:

  • content ( String ) — Content that should filter the files variable

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods

# (Finder) ext(extension)

Note: Only the files are concerned by this method files() should be called before

Method filtering the files by extension

Parameters:

  • extension ( String ) — Extension comparison that should filter the files variable

Returns:

  • ( Finder ) — The current Finder object for chaining methods
